snippet.title: Flowers-and-Ice Fairy Friendship Bracelet
snippet.description: When Tinker Bell sneaks over the border into the mysterious Winter Woods and meets a frost fairy named Periwinkle, the two make an amazing discovery. As a tribute to the special bond that forms between them, this friend...

snippet.title: Book Review: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (Book 4)
snippet.description: Though too young at 14, wizard-in-training Harry Potter is mysteriously entered in the dangerous Triwizard Tournament. The long-awaited fourth installment in this historic series justifies every bit of the hype. Despite...

snippet.title: Movie Review: Ice Age:Dawn of the Dinosaurs
snippet.description: Some kids won't like dinosaur threats to their fave characters, but most young Ice Age vets should be up for thrills.

snippet.title: Secret of the Wings Ice Pop Toppers
snippet.description: Spruce up your ice pop treats with these adorable fairy toppers.

snippet.title: 'There's a tree somewhere under all that ice.'
snippet.description: Back home in Oklahoma this week, most of my family has been under the weather--under a thick sheet of ice. A massive ice storm left my parents without power for five whole days. They have a minimum of $1,000 worth of tr...

snippet.title: TV Review: Krod Mandoon and the Flaming Sword of Fire
snippet.description: Silly swords 'n' sorcery spoof aims low and hits the target.

snippet.title: Movie Review:The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
snippet.description: Older kids might ask, 'Um, where's the mummy?' but they won't suffer any shortage of action and adventure.

snippet.title: Potty Training: Motivation and Rewards
snippet.description: How to use motivation and rewards to help potty train your child

snippet.title: Movie Review: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
snippet.description: Excellent, but the PG-13 is accurate.
